Reference

S4 classes

bcbioSingleCell()

bcbio single-cell RNA-seq data set

`[`(<bcbioSingleCell>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<ANY>)

Extract or replace parts of an object

show(<bcbioSingleCell>)

Show an object

updateObject(<bcbioSingleCell>)

Update an object to its current class definition

Quality qontrol

barcodeRanksPerSample(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Barcode ranks per sample

filterCells(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Filter cells

Plots

plotBarcodeRanks(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Plot barcode ranks

plotCellCounts(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Plot cell counts

plotGenesPerCell(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Plot genes per cell

plotMitoRatio(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Plot mitochondrial transcript abundance

plotMitoVsCoding(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Plot mitochondrial vs. coding counts

plotNovelty(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Plot novelty score

plotQC(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Quality control

plotReadsPerCell(<bcbioSingleCell>)

Plot read counts per cell

plotUMIsPerCell(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Plot UMIs per cell

plotUMIsVsGenes(<SingleCellExperiment>)

Plot UMI and gene correlation

Markdown

prepareSingleCellTemplate()

Prepare single-cell RNA-seq R Markdown template

Example data

inDrops example data set
